revised_title: Reassessment of Specific Heat of Water and its Implications
tldr: This article discusses the specific heat of water and compares the results of the author's experiments with those of other researchers, particularly Callendar and Barnes. The author highlights the differences in their findings and suggests that there may be some hidden systematic errors in the methods used by other researchers. The article also emphasizes the importance of accurately determining the specific heat of water for various applications in calorimetric work.
